attributes.action: Put operations to help the deaf within the remit of hospital waiting times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently operations for deafness problems such as cochlear implants do not fall within the government waiting times targets, and are therefore pushed further and further back in order that Trusts can reach their targets on the areas designated by the Ministry of Health

rejection.details: There is a simlar existing petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/deafness/ Please consider signing this before opening a new one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
